resources.string: Make sure all parts of your face are not covered by objects and are clearly visible. Your face should be well-lit as well.
Security issues: 2D face recognition can be spoofed by your photo, as well as by people with similar appearance or 3D mask,..

string.name: face_register_camera_instruction
string.b: Move your face left-right, up-down slowly..

resources.string: Face registration successfully! You can now use your facial recognition data as a factor for 2FA.
